April 9, 2020 – No School K-4 only
All day
April 9, 2020

Kindergarten Registration 2020-2021 – canceled
9:00 am-6:00 pm
April 9, 2020
https://www.montoursville.k12.pa.us/blog/event/kindergarten-registration-2020-2021/2020-04-09/
Kindergarten Registration for the 2020-2021 school year is canceled. Please register on line, or if you need paper copies mailed to you, please call 570-368-2491 ext 6100. Thank you !

14
Mobile Dentist- CANCELED
9:00 am-3:00 pm
April 14, 2020-April 15, 2020
https://www.montoursville.k12.pa.us/blog/event/mobile-dentist/2020-04-14/
The Mobile Dentist will be available at the high school, middle school and Loyalsock Valley on April 14 and 15, 2020.
If you would like your child to participate in this program, please contact your child’s school nurse.
School Board Meeting – Virtual
7:00 pm
April 14, 2020
https://www.montoursville.k12.pa.us/blog/event/school-board-meeting-21/2020-04-14/
There will be a school board meeting on Tuesday, April 14, 2020, 7:00 PM. This will be held virtually.
Please click the link below to join:
https://zoom.us/j/969475540
Or by Telephone:
US: +1 312 626 6799 or +1 646 558 8656 or +1 253 215 8782 or +1 301 715 8592 or +1 346 248 7799 or +1 669 900 9128
